text: Barry's Amusements was an amusement park in Portrush in Northern Ireland. It is in the center of Portrush, County Antrim, on the north coast. It was founded in 1925. The owners offered it for sale in 2019. It was reported sold for redevelopment in 2021. In April 2022, it reopened under lease as Curry's Fun Park. Category:20th-century establishments in Northern Ireland Category:1925 establishments in Europe Category:County Antrim Category:Theme parks in the United Kingdom
title: Barry's Amusements
